tools.name: create_account
tools.description: Create AWS account to add to the pool of available sandboxes
tools.mermaid:
graph TD %% Styles classDef triggerClass fill:#3498db,color:#fff,stroke:#2980b9,stroke-width:2px,font-weight:bold classDef paramClass fill:#2ecc71,color:#fff,stroke:#27ae60,stroke-width:2px classDef execClass fill:#e74c3c,color:#fff,stroke:#c0392b,stroke-width:2px,font-weight:bold classDef envClass fill:#f39c12,color:#fff,stroke:#f1c40f,stroke-width:2px %% Main Components Trigger("Trigger"):::triggerClass Params("Parameters"):::paramClass Exec("create_account"):::execClass Env("Environment"):::envClass %% Flow Trigger --> Params --> Exec Env --> Exec %% Trigger Options User("User") API("API") Webhook("Webhook") Cron("Scheduled") User --> Trigger API --> Trigger Webhook --> Trigger Cron --> Trigger %% Parameters subgraph Parameters["Parameters"] direction TB Param0("account_name (Required)
Name of AWS account"):::paramClass end Parameters --- Params %% Execution subgraph Execution["Execution"] direction TB Code("Script: aws organizations create-account --email mike.lued...") Type("Type: Docker") Image("Docker Image: amazon/aws-cli:latest") end Execution --- Exec %% Environment subgraph Environment["Environment"] direction TB EnvVars("Environment Variables:
AWS_PROFILE
SANDBOX_OU_ID"):::envClass end Environment --- Env %% Context Note ContextNote("Parameter values can be
fetched from context
based on the trigger") ContextNote -.-> Params

tools.name: move_account_to_sandbox_ou
tools.description: Move AWS account to the Sandbox OU

args.name: account_id
args.description: Id of account to move from check account status step

tools.mermaid:
graph TD %% Styles classDef triggerClass fill:#3498db,color:#fff,stroke:#2980b9,stroke-width:2px,font-weight:bold classDef paramClass fill:#2ecc71,color:#fff,stroke:#27ae60,stroke-width:2px classDef execClass fill:#e74c3c,color:#fff,stroke:#c0392b,stroke-width:2px,font-weight:bold classDef envClass fill:#f39c12,color:#fff,stroke:#f1c40f,stroke-width:2px %% Main Components Trigger("Trigger"):::triggerClass Params("Parameters"):::paramClass Exec("move_account_to_sandbox_ou"):::execClass Env("Environment"):::envClass %% Flow Trigger --> Params --> Exec Env --> Exec %% Trigger Options User("User") API("API") Webhook("Webhook") Cron("Scheduled") User --> Trigger API --> Trigger Webhook --> Trigger Cron --> Trigger %% Parameters subgraph Parameters["Parameters"] direction TB Param0("account_id (Required)

tools.name: get_account_tags
tools.description: Get tags for the given account. Metadata for sandboxes is stored in tags

args.name: account_id
args.description: Id of AWS account to get tags from

tools.mermaid:
graph TD %% Styles classDef triggerClass fill:#3498db,color:#fff,stroke:#2980b9,stroke-width:2px,font-weight:bold classDef paramClass fill:#2ecc71,color:#fff,stroke:#27ae60,stroke-width:2px classDef execClass fill:#e74c3c,color:#fff,stroke:#c0392b,stroke-width:2px,font-weight:bold classDef envClass fill:#f39c12,color:#fff,stroke:#f1c40f,stroke-width:2px %% Main Components Trigger("Trigger"):::triggerClass Params("Parameters"):::paramClass Exec("get_account_tags"):::execClass Env("Environment"):::envClass %% Flow Trigger --> Params --> Exec Env --> Exec %% Trigger Options User("User") API("API") Webhook("Webhook") Cron("Scheduled") User --> Trigger API --> Trigger Webhook --> Trigger Cron --> Trigger %% Parameters subgraph Parameters["Parameters"] direction TB Param0("account_id (Required)

tools.name: set_account_budget
tools.description: Set budget for the given account.
tools.content: aws sts assume-role --role-arn arn:aws:iam::{account_id}:role/OrganizationAccountAccessRole --role-session-name '{account_id}' && aws budgets create-budget --account-id {account_id} --budget '{"BudgetName": "Daily-Spending-Limit", "BudgetLimit": {"Amount": "{daily_limit}", "Unit": "USD"}, "TimeUnit": "DAILY", "BudgetType": "COST", "CostFilters": {}, "CostTypes": {"IncludeCredit": false, "IncludeDiscount": true, "IncludeOtherSubscription": true, "IncludeRecurring": true, "IncludeRefund": false, "IncludeSubscription": true, "IncludeSupport": true, "IncludeTax": true, "IncludeUpfront": true, "UseAmortized": false, "UseBlended": false}}'

args.name: account_id
args.description: ID of AWS account to set budget on

args.name: daily_limit
args.description: Amount in USD to set as daily spending limit

tools.mermaid:
graph TD %% Styles classDef triggerClass fill:#3498db,color:#fff,stroke:#2980b9,stroke-width:2px,font-weight:bold classDef paramClass fill:#2ecc71,color:#fff,stroke:#27ae60,stroke-width:2px classDef execClass fill:#e74c3c,color:#fff,stroke:#c0392b,stroke-width:2px,font-weight:bold classDef envClass fill:#f39c12,color:#fff,stroke:#f1c40f,stroke-width:2px %% Main Components Trigger("Trigger"):::triggerClass Params("Parameters"):::paramClass Exec("set_account_budget"):::execClass Env("Environment"):::envClass %% Flow Trigger --> Params --> Exec Env --> Exec %% Trigger Options User("User") API("API") Webhook("Webhook") Cron("Scheduled") User --> Trigger API --> Trigger Webhook --> Trigger Cron --> Trigger %% Parameters subgraph Parameters["Parameters"] direction TB Param0("account_id (Required)
ID of AWS account to set budget on"):::paramClass Param1("daily_limit (Required)

Type("Type: Docker") Image("Docker Image: amazon/aws-cli:latest") end Execution --- Exec %% Environment subgraph Environment["Environment"] direction TB EnvVars("Environment Variables:
AWS_PROFILE
SANDBOX_OU_ID"):::envClass end Environment --- Env %% Context Note ContextNote("Parameter values can be
